channel.title: Patricia Estevao on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Patricia Estevao on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Designing Lightning Wallets for the Bitcoin Users
item.description: Good morning everyone. Thank you for being here. Thank you to the organizers for this event. My talk is about designing lightning wallets for bitcoin users. I am talking about UX. But really, UX is a lot more than what wallets look like. It’s from bip39 and making backups much easier, to anything you cna imagine, to make it easier for bitcoin to use bitcoin. I am Patricia Estevao. https://patestevao.com/
